Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
gladiator group:

Would you be interested in playing a 
gladiator tournament? 

  o No 
  o yes, but use only built-in scenarios 
  o yes, but create a new set of scenarios just for the tournament 
  o yes, use a combination of existing scenarios and add new ones if necessary 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/gladiator/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
